topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b1cd9e636872793d00056a#post_55b1cd9e636872793d00056a
No, but it's similar and shares some traits.

Bronies are a fandom about a franchise that already existed; Bronies evolved from it's earlier forms after 4chan.  To use an analogy think of fans of mlp pre-gen 4 as proto-bronies.

Furries on the other hand are a completely separate independent group.  You can be a furry, you can be a brony, you can be a brony-furry, but just cause you're a brony doesn't mean you're automatically a furry and just cause you're a furry doesn't mean you're automatically a brony.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
